subject: Record Retention Schedule of NHAI
text: Hnara 7914 Torrf Me17rut SA Pnone 91-11-26074100n250 4200 (Y &Rat7 aT tothti HATIT) 748 Fax 01-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry Jf Road Transport and Hignways) #-6 0 6, 9427-10, Rat , 76 Antm-110075 65&& Secion-{O,Owarka_ Delni-M10075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Record Retention Schedule of NHAI /2017 No.1.9.9/2017 Dated the 28th November; 2017 (Decision_taken en File_No 11041/236/2012-Admn {Part) Subject: Record_Retention Schedule of NHAL-reg In the recently approved /awarded ERP contract by MORTH, digitization of NHAI records is part of the Scope of Work: Hence, it has been decided that; henceforth, no document shall be weeded out unless the same is digitized. 2 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. (A.K. Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coordination) To All Officers and Employees of HQJ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. New
